name: Extract Session Topics
prompt: Analyze the session transcript and extract the main topics that were discussed, including each topic, key points that came up during the discussion, and any decisions that were made. Use skateboarding terminology where appropriate - think of this as a skateboarding IT project team session.
assistant_prompt: Analyzing this session transcript, here are the topics we covered with discussion points and decisions that conform to the provided schema, presented with some sk8r style, without surrounding ```json ... ``` markers:
